info.author: Shawn
info.description:
MFNBC ===== Requiremnts ~~~~~~~~~~~ Python >= 3.3 Install ~~~~~~~ :: pip install mfnbc Setup (Likeihood Input File) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ It is assumed you have a word based likelihood table (csv file) where the headers consists of the literal word ``Word`` and the remaining columns are the features you would like to classify. For example: .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html
Word .. raw:: html Animal .. raw:: html Human .. raw:: html Plant .. raw:: html
cat .. raw:: html 0.33 .. raw:: html 0.03 .. raw:: html 0.05 .. raw:: html
dog .. raw:: html 0.33 .. raw:: html 0.02 .. raw:: html 0.05 .. raw:: html
leaves .. raw:: html 0.05 .. raw:: html 0.03 .. raw:: html 0.4 .. raw:: html
tree .. raw:: html 0.05 .. raw:: html 0.02 .. raw:: html 0.4 .. raw:: html
man .. raw:: html 0.12 .. raw:: html 0.45 .. raw:: html 0.05 .. raw:: html
women .. raw:: html 0.12 .. raw:: html 0.45 .. raw:: html 0.05 .. raw:: html
Setup (Unlabeled Data File) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The key is having the header titled ``Text`` any other fields will be included unmodified in the output file. .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html
ID .. raw:: html Text .. raw:: html
1 .. raw:: html The cat is my pet and he is lovley. A dog will not do. .. raw:: html
2 .. raw:: html The man and women had a cat and lived under a tree .. raw:: html
3 .. raw:: html The tree had lots of leaves .. raw:: html
4 .. raw:: html A man lives under a tree with many leaves. A women has a cat as a pet .. raw:: html
5 .. raw:: html The dog and cat chanse the man under the tree .. raw:: html
6 .. raw:: html The man and women live in a house. .. raw:: html
Import ~~~~~~ .. code:: python from mfnbc import MFNBC Instantiate ~~~~~~~~~~~ .. code:: python m = MFNBC(, , Example ~~~~~~~ .. code:: python m = MFNBC('likeli_sample.csv', 'input_sample.csv', False) m.write_csv() You can also print the probability table by .. code:: python m.probs Example Results ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html .. raw:: html
